maxim.message: ~Self~ cuts the Maxim Tomato in two halves and eat them in a single bite! ~Self~ gained 300 life points!

icecream.message: ~Self~ spots an ice cream! OM NOM NOM NOM! ~Self~ gained 25 life points!

drink.message: ~Self~ swallow an Energy Drink! ~Self~ gained 150 life points!

meat.message: ~Self~ found meat and ate it! OM NOM NOM NOM! ~Self~ gained 100 life points!

milk.message: ~Self~ drinks a glass of milk! ~Self~ gained 75 life points!

pudding.message: ~Self~ spots an pudding! OM NOM NOM NOM! ~Self~ gained 25 life points!

juice.message: ~Self~ drinks orange juice! ~Self~ gained 50 life points!

cookie.message: ~Self~ spots an cookie! OM NOM NOM NOM! ~Self~ gained 25 life points!

coffee.message: ~Self~ gets a cup of coffee! ~Self~ gained 45 life points!

cake.message: ~Self~ spots an cake! OM NOM NOM NOM! ~Self~ gained 50 life points!

hotdog.message: ~Self~ eats a whole hot dog in a single bite! ~Self~ gained 60 life points!

watermelon.message: ~Self~ spots an watermelon! OM NOM NOM NOM! ~Self~ gained 100 life points!

icehell.announcement: Warning! A snowstorm is approaching! Lots of Mr. Frosty, Chilly, Ice Creams and Ice power stars appeared!

hammerbros.announcement: Hammer Bros. attacks! And they brought some Rockys, Meat and Hammer power stars with them!

bugattack.announcement: Bug Swarm! Bugzzy is leading Bronto Burt, Lovely and Cappy, all of them aiming for the Milk and Maxim Tomatoes! Use the Suplex power stars to defeat them!

cooktime.announcement: Dinner Time! Chef Kawasaki's team came to get all the meat, pudding and cake they can! Use the Cutter, Fire and Parasol power stars to defeat them!

ironfist.announcement: Irom Mam is looking for a fight! Be sure to eat all the Meat and drink all the Energy Drinks you can to defeat him and the Knuckle Joes! Fighter and Suplex power stars appeared!

judofight.announcement: Fight in the dojo! Jukid, Knuckle Joe and Biospark are rampaging the place! There's food and power stars everywhere!

bombbattle.announcement: EXPLOSIONS! Poppy Bros. Sr. and Jr., Jungle Bomber abd Bombers are going to blast everything! At the same time, some items and power stars appeared!

dynablade.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Dyna Blade and her minions!

fattywhale.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Fatty Whale and his minions!

dedede.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat King Dedede and his minions!

metaknight.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Meta Knight and his minions!

kracko.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Kracko and his minions!

whispy.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Whispy Woods and his minions!

twinwoods.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat two Whispy Woods!

lolololalala.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Lololo and Lalala!

marx.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Marx!

shinebright.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Mr. Shine & Mr. Bright and their minions!

paintroller.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Paint Roller and his minions!

darkmatter.announcement: Warning: A Boss is approaching! Defeat Dark Matter and his minions!
